TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TraceSource extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供一組方法和屬性，可以讓應用程式追蹤程式碼的執行情形，並讓追蹤訊息與其來源產生關聯。

span.span: Provides a set of methods and properties that enable applications to trace the execution of code and associate trace messages with their source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式會使用 類別產生能夠與應用程式相關聯的追蹤。The class is used by applications to produce traces that can be associated with the application. 提供了追蹤方法，能讓您輕鬆地追蹤事件、追蹤資料和問題資訊追蹤。 provides tracing methods that allow you to easily trace events, trace data, and issue informational traces. 追蹤輸出會由組態檔設定。Trace output from can be controlled by configuration file settings. 組態檔位於應用程式執行檔的資料夾中，而且具有.config 副檔名加入應用程式的名稱。The configuration file is located in the folder with the application executable and has the name of the application with the .config file name extension added. 例如，TraceSourceSample.exe 的組態檔的名稱是 TraceSourceSample.exe.config。組態檔可用來判斷要傳送的追蹤資訊位於何處，以及活動層級是要追蹤。For example, the name of the configuration file for TraceSourceSample.exe is TraceSourceSample.exe.config. The configuration file can be used to determine where the trace information is to be sent and what levels of activity are to be traced. 下列範例顯示範例應用程式組態檔的內容。The following example shows the contents of a sample application configuration file. ``` ``` 類別由來源時，通常就是應用程式名稱的名稱。The class is identified by the name of a source, typically the name of the application. 來自特定元件的追蹤訊息可初始化特定的追蹤來源，讓使用者輕易識別所有訊息來自該元件。The trace messages coming from a particular component can be initiated by a particular trace source, allowing all messages coming from that component to be easily identified. 定義追蹤方法，但沒有實際上提供任何特定機制來產生及儲存追蹤資料。 defines tracing methods but does not actually provide any specific mechanism for generating and storing tracing data. 追蹤接聽項，也就是可以由追蹤來源載入的外掛程式所產生的追蹤資料。The tracing data is produced by trace listeners, which are plug-ins that can be loaded by trace sources. > [!NOTE] > 您不應該在最終處理期間呼叫追蹤方法。You should not call the tracing methods during finalization. 如此一來可能會導致擲回。Doing so can result in an being thrown. 您可以透過加入或移除自訂追蹤輸出的目標執行個體，或是從儲存在集合屬性。You can customize the tracing output's target by adding or removing instances to or from the collection stored in the property. 根據預設，追蹤輸出會使用所產生的執行個體類別。By default, trace output is produced using an instance of the class. 上述組態檔範例示範如何移除並加入來產生追蹤來源的追蹤輸出。The preceding configuration file example demonstrates removing the and adding a to produce the trace output for the trace source. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[<接聽程式>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/listeners-element-for-source.md)和[ <sharedListeners>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/sharedlisteners-element.md)。For more information, see [<listeners>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/listeners-element-for-source.md) and [<sharedListeners>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/sharedlisteners-element.md). > [!NOTE] > 加入追蹤接聽程式，集合可能會造成追蹤，時擲回例外狀況，如果追蹤接聽程式所使用的資源無法使用。Adding a trace listener to the collection can cause an exception to be thrown while tracing, if a resource used by the trace listener is not available. 條件和擲回的例外狀況取決於追蹤接聽項，且無法列舉本主題中。The conditions and the exception thrown depend on the trace listener and cannot be enumerated in this topic. 可能很有用呼叫方法`try` / `catch`區塊偵測和處理來自追蹤接聽程式的任何例外狀況。It may be useful to place calls to the methods in `try`/`catch` blocks to detect and handle any exceptions from trace listeners. 類別會提供以動態方式控制追蹤輸出的方法。The class provides the means to dynamically control the tracing output. 上述組態檔範例示範您可以關閉追蹤從追蹤來源和控制項的層級的追蹤，就會發生。The preceding configuration file example shows how you can turn off tracing from a trace source and control the level at which tracing occurs. 您可以修改來源參數的值不需要重新編譯您的應用程式。You can modify the value of the source switch without recompiling your application. 如需使用組態檔來設定參數資訊，請參閱和[How to： 建立、 初始化和設定追蹤參數](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/how-to-create-initialize-and-configure-trace-switches.md)。For information on using the configuration file to set a switch, see and [How to: Create, Initialize and Configure Trace Switches](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/how-to-create-initialize-and-configure-trace-switches.md). > [!NOTE] > 如果應用程式執行時，您可以修改組態檔，必須停止並重新啟動應用程式或必須呼叫方法，新設定才會生效。If you modify a configuration file while an application is executing, the application must be stopped and restarted or the method must be called before the new settings take effect. 列舉型別用來定義事件類型的追蹤訊息。The enumeration is used to define the event type of the trace message. 追蹤篩選使用來判斷是否追蹤接聽程式應該會產生的追蹤訊息。Trace filters use the to determine if a trace listener should produce the trace message. 追蹤接聽程式可以選擇性地有額外的追蹤篩選透過篩選。The trace listeners can optionally have an additional layer of filtering through a trace filter. 如果追蹤接聽項會具有相關聯的篩選，接聽程式呼叫上該篩選條件來判斷是否要產生的追蹤資訊的方法。If a trace listener has an associated filter, the listener calls the method on that filter to determine whether or not to produce the trace information. 追蹤接聽程式使用的值類別內容， ，和格式追蹤輸出。The trace listeners use the values of the class properties , , and to format trace output. 您可以使用設定檔案屬性來設定， ，和屬性。You can use configuration file attributes to set the , , and properties. 下列範例會設定屬性`false`和屬性設定為 3。The following example sets the property to `false` and the property to 3. ``` ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用轉送給追蹤接聽程式的類別。The following code example shows the use of the class to forward traces to listeners. 此範例也示範參數和篩選器的使用方式。The example also demonstrates switch and filter usage. [!code-cpp[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource2/CPP/tracesource2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource2/CS/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource2/VB/program.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用指定的來源名稱，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, using the specified name for the source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 來源名稱用來識別追蹤。The source name is used to identify traces. 它由來判定追蹤接聽程式是否應該產生追蹤。It is used by a to determine whether a trace listener should produce the trace. 建議的作法是使用應用程式的名稱做為來源名稱。The recommended practice is to use the name of the application for the source name. > [!NOTE] > 不需要建立新針對每個追蹤要求的執行個體。It is not necessary to create a new instance for each trace request. 建立一個執行個體，並將它用於所有追蹤要求的應用程式。Create one instance and use it for all trace requests for the application. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用建構函式來建立新物件。The following code example shows the use of the constructor to create a new object. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource2#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource2/CS/program.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource2#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource2/VB/program.vb#9)]

span.span: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specifies the default source level at which to trace.

summary.span: 使用指定的來源名稱，以及要開始進行追蹤的層級，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, using the specified name for the source and the default source level at which tracing is to occur.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 來源名稱用來識別追蹤。The source name is used to identify traces. 可由來判斷是否發生追蹤及來判斷是否要產生追蹤。It can be used by a to determine if tracing is to occur and by a to determine whether to produce the trace. 預設來源層級由判斷追蹤是否發生根據來源層級要追蹤的訊息。The default source level is used by an to determine if tracing is to occur based on the source level of the message to be traced. > [!NOTE] > 不需要建立新針對每個追蹤要求的執行個體。It is not necessary to create a new instance for each trace request. 建立一個執行個體，並將它用於所有追蹤要求的應用程式。Create one instance and use it for all trace requests for the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓追蹤來源會呼叫接聽程式之前的訊息篩選。The property allows the filtering of messages before the trace source calls the listeners. 參數用來檢查是否應該產生或忽略追蹤呼叫。The switch is used to check whether trace calls should be generated or ignored. 每一種追蹤方法呼叫方法來判斷是否要繼續進行追蹤。Each trace method calls the method of the to determine whether to proceed with the trace. 如果呼叫傳回`true`，會呼叫接聽程式。If the call returns `true`, the listeners are called.

MemberSignature.Value: public void TraceData (System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType eventType, int id, object data);

param.name: eventType
param.span: 其中一個列舉值，可指定追蹤資料的事件類型。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the event type of the trace data.

param.span: 事件的數值識別項。

summary.span: 使用指定的事件類型、事件識別項和追蹤資料，將追蹤資料寫入 集合中的追蹤接聽程式。

span.span: Writes trace data to the trace listeners in the collection using the specified event type, event identifier, and trace data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法、 like方法，適用於自動化的工具，但它也可讓附加其他物件，例如例外狀況執行個體，來追蹤。The method, like the method, is intended for automated tools, but it also allows the attaching of an additional object, such as an exception instance, to the trace. 方法呼叫方法所傳回物件屬性。The method calls the method of the object returned by the property. 如果傳回`true`，呼叫對應方法上的所有接聽程式。If returns `true`, calls the corresponding method on all listeners. 否則，傳回，而不呼叫接聽程式的方法。Otherwise, returns without calling the listeners' methods. > [!NOTE] > 物件是限制最多`id`65,535 的值。The object is limited to a maximum `id` value of 65,535. 如果`id`指定的值大於 65,535，物件會使用 65,535。If the `id` value specified is greater than 65,535, the object uses 65,535. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用來篩選和追蹤訊息轉送到接聽程式的方法。The following code example shows the use of the method to filter and forward a trace message to the listeners. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource2#28](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource2/CS/program.cs#28)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource2#28](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource2/VB/program.vb#28)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void TraceData (System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType eventType, int id, params object[] data);
.method public hidebysig instance void TraceData(valuetype System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType eventType, int32 id, object[] data) cil managed
Public Sub TraceData (eventType As TraceEventType, id As Integer, ParamArray data As Object())
public: void TraceData(System::Diagnostics::TraceEventType eventType, int id, ... cli::array <System::Object ^> ^ data);

param.name: eventType
param.span: 其中一個列舉值，可指定追蹤資料的事件類型。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the event type of the trace data.

param.name: id
param.span: 事件的數值識別項。

span.span: A numeric identifier for the event.

param.name: data
param.span: 包含追蹤資料的物件陣列。

span.span: An object array containing the trace data.

summary.span: 使用指定的事件類型、事件識別項和追蹤資料，將追蹤資料陣列寫入 集合中的追蹤接聽程式。

span.span: Writes trace data to the trace listeners in the collection using the specified event type, event identifier, and trace data array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法、 like方法，適用於自動化的工具，但它也可讓附加其他物件，例如例外狀況執行個體和堆疊追蹤，追蹤。The method, like the method, is intended for automated tools, but it also allows the attaching of additional objects, such as an exception instance and a stack trace, to the trace. 方法呼叫方法所傳回物件屬性。The method calls the method of the object returned by the property. 如果傳回`true`，呼叫對應方法上的所有接聽程式。If returns `true`, calls the corresponding method on all listeners. 否則，傳回，而不呼叫接聽程式的方法。Otherwise, returns without calling the listeners' methods. > [!NOTE] > 物件是限制最多`id`65,535 的值。The object is limited to a maximum `id` value of 65,535. 如果`id`指定的值大於 65,535，物件會使用 65,535。If the `id` value specified is greater than 65,535, the object uses 65,535.

exception.span: 嘗試在最終處理期間追蹤事件。

span.span: An attempt was made to trace an event during finalization.

summary.span: 將追蹤事件訊息寫入 集合中的追蹤接聽程式。

span.span: Writes a trace event message to the trace listeners in the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: public void TraceEvent (System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType eventType, int id);
.method public hidebysig instance void TraceEvent(valuetype System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType eventType, int32 id) cil managed
Public Sub TraceEvent (eventType As TraceEventType, id As Integer)
public: void TraceEvent(System::Diagnostics::TraceEventType eventType, int id);

param.name: eventType
param.span: 其中一個列舉值，可指定追蹤資料的事件類型。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the event type of the trace data.

param.name: id
param.span: 事件的數值識別項。

span.span: A numeric identifier for the event.

summary.span: 使用指定的事件類型和事件識別項，將追蹤事件訊息寫入 集合中的追蹤接聽程式。

span.span: Writes a trace event message to the trace listeners in the collection using the specified event type and event identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法的目的在於工具可以自動處理的追蹤事件。The method is intended to trace events that can be processed automatically by tools. 例如，如果特定的事件由特定的來源追蹤監視工具可以通知系統管理員。For example, a monitoring tool can notify an administrator if a specific event is traced by a specific source. 方法呼叫方法所傳回物件屬性。The method calls the method of the object returned by the property. 如果傳回`true`，呼叫對應方法的每個接聽程式。If returns `true`, calls the corresponding method of each listener. 否則，傳回，而不呼叫接聽程式的方法。Otherwise, returns without calling the listeners' methods. 追蹤內容是特定的接聽程式。The trace content is listener specific. 如果接聽程式實作不會覆寫此方法，預設輸出會是追蹤來源、 其數字的識別和事件類型的名稱。If the method is not overridden by the listener implementation, the default output is the name of the trace source, its numeric identity, and the event type. 其他追蹤內容所依存的接聽程式屬性值。Additional trace content is dependent upon the listener's property value. > [!NOTE] > 物件是限制最多`id`65,535 的值。The object is limited to a maximum `id` value of 65,535. 如果`id`指定的值大於 65,535，使用 65,535。If the `id` value specified is greater than 65,535, the uses 65,535. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法，將追蹤事件傳遞到接聽程式。The following code example shows the use of the method to pass a trace event to the listeners. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource2#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource2/CS/program.cs#17)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource2#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource2/VB/program.vb#17)]

span.span: An attempt was made to trace an event during finalization.

param.name: eventType

param.span: 要寫入的追蹤訊息。

summary.span: 使用指定的事件類型、事件識別項和訊息，將追蹤事件訊息寫入 集合中的追蹤接聽程式。

span.span: Writes a trace event message to the trace listeners in the collection using the specified event type, event identifier, and message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法的目的在於工具可以自動處理的追蹤事件。The method is intended to trace events that can be processed automatically by tools. 例如，如果特定的事件由特定的來源追蹤監視工具可以通知系統管理員。For example, a monitoring tool can notify an administrator if a specific event is traced by a specific source. 方法呼叫方法所傳回物件屬性。The method calls the method of the object returned by the property. 如果傳回`true`，呼叫對應方法的每個接聽程式。If returns `true`, calls the corresponding method of each listener. 否則，傳回，而不呼叫接聽程式的方法。Otherwise, returns without calling the listeners' methods. 追蹤內容是特定的接聽程式。The trace content is listener specific. 如果接聽程式實作不會覆寫此方法，預設輸出就是追蹤來源、 其數字識別、 事件型別和訊息名稱。If the method is not overridden by the listener implementation, the default output is the name of the trace source, its numeric identity, the event type, and the message. 其他追蹤內容所依存的接聽程式屬性值。Additional trace content is dependent upon the listener's property value. > [!NOTE] > 物件是限制最多`id`65,535 的值。The object is limited to a maximum `id` value of 65,535. 如果`id`指定的值大於 65,535，物件會使用 65,535。If the `id` value specified is greater than 65,535, the object uses 65,535. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法，將追蹤事件傳遞到接聽程式。The following code example shows the use of the method to pass a trace event to the listeners. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource2#18](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource2/CS/program.cs#18)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource2#18](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource2/VB/program.vb#18)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void TraceEvent (System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType eventType, int id, string format, params object[] args);
.method public hidebysig instance void TraceEvent(valuetype System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType eventType, int32 id, string format, object[] args) cil managed
Public Sub TraceEvent (eventType As TraceEventType, id As Integer, format As String, ParamArray args As Object())
public: void TraceEvent(System::Diagnostics::TraceEventType eventType, int id, System::String ^ format, ... cli::array <System::Object ^> ^ args);

param.name: eventType
param.span: 其中一個列舉值，可指定追蹤資料的事件類型。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the event type of the trace data.

param.name: id
param.span: 事件的數值識別項。

span.span: A numeric identifier for the event.

param.name: format
param.span: 複合格式字串，其中包含混合零或多個格式項目的文字，並與 args 陣列中的物件相對應。

span.span: A composite format string that contains text intermixed with zero or more format items, which correspond to objects in the args array.

param.name: args
param.span: 陣列，含有零或多個要格式化的物件。

span.span: An array containing zero or more objects to format.

summary.span: 使用指定的事件類型、事件識別項和引數陣列與格式，將追蹤事件寫入 集合中的追蹤接聽程式。

span.span: Writes a trace event to the trace listeners in the collection using the specified event type, event identifier, and argument array and format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關`format`參數，請參閱[複合格式化](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md)。For more information about the `format` parameter, see [Composite Formatting](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md). 方法的目的在於工具可以自動處理的追蹤事件。The method is intended to trace events that can be processed automatically by tools. 例如，如果特定的事件由特定的來源追蹤監視工具可以通知系統管理員。For example, a monitoring tool can notify an administrator if a specific event is traced by a specific source. 方法呼叫方法所傳回物件屬性。The method calls the method of the object returned by the property. 如果傳回`true`，呼叫對應方法的每個接聽程式。If returns `true`, calls the corresponding method of each listener. 否則，傳回，而不呼叫接聽程式的方法。Otherwise, returns without calling the listeners' methods. 追蹤內容是特定的接聽程式。The trace content is listener specific. 預設值方法會寫入來源名稱、 事件類型和追蹤標頭中的數字識別然後呼叫方法，傳遞`format`字串和`args`陣列和使用屬性格式化做為訊息輸出字串。The default method writes the source name, event type, and numeric identity in the trace header, then calls the method, passing the `format` string and `args` array and using the property to format the string as the message output. > [!NOTE] > 物件是限制最多`id`65,535 的值。The object is limited to a maximum `id` value of 65,535. 如果`id`指定的值大於 65,535，物件會使用 65,535。If the `id` value specified is greater than 65,535, the object uses 65,535. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法，將追蹤事件傳遞到接聽程式。The following code example shows the use of the method to pass a trace event to the listeners. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource2#24](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource2/CS/program.cs#24)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource2#24](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource2/VB/program.vb#24)]

is invalid.
-or-

exception.span: 用來指示要格式化的引數的數目小於零，或者大於或等於要格式化的指定物件數目。

span.span: The number that indicates an argument to format is less than zero, or greater than or equal to the number of specified objects to format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供一項參考用訊息要讀取的使用者，而不是由工具。The method provides an informational message intended to be read by users and not by tools. 呼叫方法，設定`eventType`至和訊息字串形式傳遞的資訊訊息。 calls the method, setting `eventType` to and passing the informative message as the message string. 方法會呼叫方法的每個追蹤接聽程式。The method in turn calls the method of each trace listener.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關`format`參數，請參閱[複合格式化](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md)。For more information about the `format` parameter, see [Composite Formatting](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md). 方法提供一項參考用訊息要讀取的使用者，而不是由工具。The method provides an informational message intended to be read by users and not by tools. 呼叫方法，設定`eventType`至和傳遞的訊息內容做為物件陣列與格式設定資訊。 calls the method, setting `eventType` to and passing the message content as an object array with formatting information. 方法會呼叫方法的每個追蹤接聽程式。The method in turn calls the method of each trace listener.

MemberSignature.Value: public void TraceTransfer (int id, string message, Guid relatedActivityId);
.method public hidebysig instance void TraceTransfer(int32 id, string message, valuetype System.Guid relatedActivityId) cil managed
Public Sub TraceTransfer (id As Integer, message As String, relatedActivityId As Guid)
public: void TraceTransfer(int id, System::String ^ message, Guid relatedActivityId);

param.name: id
param.span: 事件的數值識別項。

span.span: A numeric identifier for the event.

param.name: message
param.span: 要寫入的追蹤訊息。

span.span: The trace message to write.

param.name: relatedActivityId
param.span: 識別相關活動的結構。

span.span: A structure that identifies the related activity.

summary.span: 使用指定的數值識別項、訊息和相關的活動識別項，將追蹤傳輸訊息寫入至 集合中的追蹤接聽程式。

span.span: Writes a trace transfer message to the trace listeners in the collection using the specified numeric identifier, message, and related activity identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呼叫方法中的每個追蹤接聽程式屬性來寫入追蹤資訊。The method calls the method of each trace listener in the property to write the trace information. 預設值方法的基底中類別會呼叫方法來處理呼叫，並設定`eventType`至和附加的字串表示法`relatedActivityId`GUID `message`。The default method in the base class calls the method to process the call, setting `eventType` to and appending a string representation of the `relatedActivityId` GUID to `message`. 用來搭配邏輯作業。 is intended to be used with the logical operations of a . `relatedActivityId`參數與相關屬性物件。The `relatedActivityId` parameter relates to the property of a object. 如果邏輯作業開始一個活動中，並將傳送至另一個，第二個活動會藉由呼叫記錄傳送方法。If a logical operation begins in one activity and transfers to another, the second activity logs the transfer by calling the method. 呼叫與之前的身分識別相關的新活動身分識別。The call relates the new activity identity to the previous identity. 這項功能的最可能的取用者會追蹤檢視器，它會報告跨越多個活動的邏輯作業。The most likely consumer of this functionality is a trace viewer that can report logical operations that span multiple activities.
